title:
Constant case of the Grothendieck-Serre conjecture in mixed
  characteristic
abstract:
Let D be a DVR of mixed characteristic. Let G be a reductive D-group scheme.
Then the Grothendieck-Serre conjecture is true for the D-group scheme G and any
geometrically regular local D-algebra R. Also we prove a version of
Lindel-Ojanguren-Gabber's geometric presentation lemma in the DVR context.
